alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 8:29PM CST until January 27 at 2:40PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River at Macon. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Water covers roadway leading from cattle farmland to chicken coops downstream of Highway 45 bridge on the left side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 31.0 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Noxubee River Macon 28.0 17.3 Wed 8 pm CST 30.7 28.8 22.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 900 AM CST.
